entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:49 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:49 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
